data.description: Motivated Seller! This spacious 4-bedroom 3-bathroom home features the perfect blend of privacy and open floor plan. Upon entry to the over 3,100 sq ft two-story home is a grand staircase with a view of foyer, a formal living room that leads to the formal dining room. The open kitchen includes an eat-in dining room just off the newly renovated private deck, which is perfect for entertaining. The main level also includes a full bathroom, pantry, laundry room, sitting room or office, and access to the two-car garage. Enjoy the nicely centered fireplace in the large sunken family room with unobstructed views of eat-in dining and kitchen. The second staircase accessible from the family room provides direct access to the huge master bedroom, with a second fireplace, sitting area, ensuite with double vanities, garden tub, separate shower, separate restroom, and walk-in closet. The three additional bedrooms are sensibly designed for ultimate privacy with another full bathroom nicely nestled between bedrooms for easy accessibility. The partially finished basement has an additional 3-bedrooms, full bathroom, kitchen, laundry room, open dining, living room with direct access to private backyard, and adds another 1,400 sq ft to the home. The additional space is perfect for live-in parents, rental or entertaining. This home has some nice upgrades, with stainless steel appliances, backsplash, updated flooring, but still leaves room for the new owner to add their personal touch.
